description.originalText: Dashana was a great full-day nanny to my 3.5-month-old daughter.  She was so creative with her, and kept her entertained and learning throughout the day.  Her experience was evident, and I was grateful for her tips throughout the day!

description.displayText: Miss C. has always gone above and beyond for my daughters. I. and F. Particularly F. F. is my beautiful 14-year-old special-needs child who has autism and is nonverbal. Miss C. has always gone above and beyond, particularly when it comes to her and making sure if she has everything she needs. Miss C. has shown great patients dedication understanding, and compassion when it comes to my daughters. Particularly Felicity she has always gone above and beyond. I would highly recommend her. And if I had the opportunity to do so, I would rehire her again.

description.displayText: Dashana was great! She was very kind, caring and fun with my daughter. They had lots of fun. She is highly educated and was able to assist with homework. She was able to cook delicious meals (breakfast, lunch, & dinner) for my child. We would definitely be hiring her again! Thank you.
description.originalText: Dashana was great! She was very kind, caring and fun with my daughter. They had lots of fun. She is highly educated and was able to assist with homework. She was able to cook delicious meals (breakfast, lunch, & dinner) for my child. We would definitely be hiring her again! Thank you.

description.displayText: Dashana is just an incredible person. She is kind, patient, and she has been amazingly dependable over the last three years--always on time, never sick, and she was able to be really adaptable to changing schedules, flexible about our vacation time, and going above and beyond when we had some extra work. Every week, she cooked, which was hugely helpful for us and made coming home at dinnertime so much nicer. She helped to make sure the kids got to their after school activities, was proactive in arranging play dates, and helped with crafts and playtime. More than once, other mothers have asked me how on earth we got so lucky that we had her working with us! I highly, highly recommend her and we are so sorry that our schedules are changing so we won't be able to have her stay. The next family will be very lucky to have her!!

description.displayText: She was very nice and gentle with S.  He enjoyed the time he spent with her. She was a godsend.  I could not have asked for any better assistance.

description.displayText:
Dashana really is versatile -- she can be laid back or high energy depending on your child. She provides a wonderful care experience for my special needs toddler. She makes sure to follow her schedule while entertaining her and keeping her safe. Dashana is reliable and efficient. I hope to keep Dashana around for a very long time.

Your family will be blessed beyond words when Dashana is added. 

Phone calls to discuss my experience with Dashana further are welcome.
